product_name: Pearl Izumi Attack Bib Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: These Pearl Izumi Attack bib bike shorts grant you the benefits of a traditional bib, plus extended coverage, UPF protection and superior technical performance. SELECT Transfer fabric provides cool comfort, quickly wicking moisture and offering excellent stretch for freedom of movement. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Anatomic 8-panel design eliminates any uncomfortable inseams, as well as potential pressure points. Direct-Vent panels boost overall airflow to keep you cool and comfortable on warm days. Seamless 3D Race chamois has 13mm contoured padding to prevent friction points and provide protection in key areas. Chamois relieves pressure points with differentiated padding levels and wicks moisture away from skin. Flatlock seams decrease the likelihood of uncomfortable chafing. Silicone grippers at leg hems hold the Pearl Izumi Attack bib bike shorts in position. Reflective elements boost your visibility in low light.
